body_html:
I think this is a duplicate of #375 and it looks like there are some open PRs which are taking care of solving this problem already, which Carsten is in the process of reviewing. Sorry for the hassle 😞
@klappradla if you get a chance to update the readme, please feel free to do so. After the above mentioned PRs are merged we can remove your instructions again, but in the meanwhile it might help newcomers to get set up easily. Thanks!!! ✨

body:
I think this is a duplicate of https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/375 and it looks like there are some open PRs which are taking care of solving this problem already, which Carsten is in the process of reviewing. Sorry for the hassle :disappointed: 
@klappradla if you get a chance to update the readme, please feel free to do so. After the above mentioned PRs are merged we can remove your instructions again, but in the meanwhile it might help newcomers to get set up easily. Thanks!!! :sparkles:
